original_title: 女陰陽師 陰魔侵蝕
overview: The Narukami family and the Tsuchigumo family have protected Japan since ancient times. The Tsuchigumo family plotted to overthrow Japan through magic. In order to save this country, the Narukami clan approaches Tomoe, the only human who inherits the blood of both families. The demonic hands of the Tsuchigumo family are closing in on Tomoe! What is the fate of Japan?
title: Woman Onmyoji Infernal Corruption
